attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to be stricter on the non resident parent if they don’t pay child support they do community service as the resident parent will then feel like they are being listened to and it will help the community as it is having work being done
attributes.background: Parents are being penalised by the other parent, example the non resident parent will either have no job, go sick at work and be working cash in hand CMS say they can’tdo anything about it but is ok for the non resident parents to not support a child the resident parent would be done for neglect

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Review the child maintenance non-resident parents are required to pay by CMS
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641691

Make non-payment of child maintenance a criminal offence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646601
